mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection(uid, iid, timestamp, isDelete) VALUES (#{uid}, #{iid}, #{timestamp}, #{isDelete})
mapper.select: SELECT collection.uid, collection.iid, name, song_name, collection.isDelete, collection.timestamp FROM collection, song, user WHERE collection.uid = #{uid} AND collection.isDelete = '1' AND collection.uid = user.uid AND collection.iid = song.iid
